_note: Copy this file to app_settings.json and fill in your customer-specific values

workflow_config._comment: Workflow status mappings (POSITIVE INCLUSION - list statuses to INCLUDE)

field_metadata._comment: Optional metadata about field mappings for validation

effort_category_mappings._comment: Map Effort Category custom field values to Flow Types
effort_category_mappings._note: Two-tier classification: Primary from issue type, Secondary from effort category

_instructions.step1: Replace YOUR_DEV_PROJECT1, YOUR_DEV_PROJECT2, YOUR_OPS_PROJECT with actual JIRA project keys
_instructions.step2: Replace customfield_XXXXX with actual custom field IDs from your JIRA instance
_instructions.step3: Find custom field IDs: JIRA → Admin → System → Custom Fields
_instructions.step4: Update workflow_config statuses to match your JIRA workflow
_instructions.step5: Update effort_category_mappings to match your Effort Category field values

_field_reference._comment: Example Customer Customer Field IDs (EXAMPLE - update with your own)
